questions.question: How has money changed your life, or maybe the landscape of experience in your life?
If you were to build a new social network today, how would you fix Twitter?
What's today, as we stand here today, what sector will the world's first trillionaire come from?
Do you have an idea of which energy, which alternate energy, sustainable energy is the most promising?
I know you said you don't like to give advice, but what advice would you give to a young person?
You ever look up at the stars and think about like the big why question?
